sentences: She updates the software traceability matrix for the medical device every Friday.
She does not update the software traceability matrix when the requirements are still in draft.
Does she update the software traceability matrix after each unit-test cycle?
Doesn't she update the software traceability matrix whenever a risk control changes?
She is updating the software traceability matrix right now while the notified body audits remotely.
She is not updating the software traceability matrix because the Jira-to-DOORS sync is failing.
Is she updating the software traceability matrix for the new Bluetooth stack this afternoon?
Isn't she updating the software traceability matrix even though the hazard analysis finished?
She has updated the software traceability matrix for three release candidates this quarter.
She has not updated the software traceability matrix since the cybersecurity patch was added.
Has she updated the software traceability matrix to link the AI module to its verification tests?
Hasn't she updated the software traceability matrix for usability requirements yet?
She has been updating the software traceability matrix all morning without a break.
She has not been updating the software traceability matrix because the test results are still importing.
Has she been updating the software traceability matrix from her home office since dawn?
Hasn't she been updating the software traceability matrix throughout this validation sprint?
She updated the software traceability matrix last night just before the FDA eSTAR upload.
She did not update the software traceability matrix yesterday due to a server outage.
Did she update the software traceability matrix after adding the new alert algorithm?
Didn't she update the software traceability matrix once the localization bug was fixed?
She was updating the software traceability matrix when the power failure hit the lab.
She was not updating the software traceability matrix that evening; she was training new interns instead.
Was she updating the software traceability matrix at midnight as planned?
Wasn't she updating the software traceability matrix when the auditor called?
She had updated the software traceability matrix before the regulatory consultant asked for evidence.
She had not updated the software traceability matrix by the time the sprint demo began.
Had she updated the software traceability matrix on the legacy firmware branch?
Hadn't she updated the software traceability matrix before the usability study started?
She had been updating the software traceability matrix for hours when the critical defect surfaced.
She had not been updating the software traceability matrix because the requirement IDs were renumbered.
Had she been updating the software traceability matrix throughout the weekend build?
Hadn't she been updating the software traceability matrix until the prototype crashed?
She will update the software traceability matrix tomorrow after the code freeze.
She will not update the software traceability matrix tonight if the unit tests still fail.
Will she update the software traceability matrix once the AI library is integrated?
Won't she update the software traceability matrix after the new alarms are configured?
She will be updating the software traceability matrix at this time next Wednesday.
She will not be updating the software traceability matrix during the ISO 13485 workshop.
Will she be updating the software traceability matrix when the remote team logs in?
Won't she be updating the software traceability matrix while the beta testers run scenarios?
She will have updated the software traceability matrix for all safety classes by Friday.
She will not have updated the software traceability matrix if the requirement links remain broken.
Will she have updated the software traceability matrix before the EU MDR gateway closes?
Won't she have updated the software traceability matrix by the time the grant is reviewed?
She will have been updating the software traceability matrix for twelve hours by the deployment cutoff.
She will not have been updating the software traceability matrix all day if the cloud lab shuts down.
Will she have been updating the software traceability matrix continuously until the MDR submission?
Won't she have been updating the software traceability matrix for weeks when the pilot trial ends?
